title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once again to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: Simba, the lion cub who will grow up to be king, faces his destiny after the death of his father, Mufasa, and the betrayal of his uncle, Scar.

title: Joker
synopsis: In Gotham City, a failed comic turns to a life of crime and chaos, assuming the identity of the infamous Joker. His descent into madness provides a new perspective on society's failure to address mental health.

title: Frozen II
synopsis: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, and Sven journey into the enchanted forest to uncover the origin of Elsa's powers and save their kingdom.

title: Parasite
synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, leading to unexpected consequences that unravel both families’ lives.
Two young British soldiers during World War I are tasked with delivering a message that could save 1,600 men.

title: Knives Out
synopsis: When a renowned crime novelist is found dead, Detective Benoit Blanc investigates the case in a twist-filled story.

title: Toy Story 4
synopsis: Woody, Buzz, and the gang embark on a road trip adventure with a new friend, Forky.

title: Ford v Ferrari
synopsis: The story of visionary car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles as they build a car for Ford to challenge Ferrari.

title: Ad Astra
synopsis: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a dangerous mission to uncover the truth about his missing father and a mysterious threat.

title: Us
synopsis: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when doppelgängers begin to terrorize them.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
synopsis: Peter Parker faces new challenges in Europe when mysterious elemental creatures appear and a hero named Mysterio offers help.
